original_query: "Search for 'Nobel prize winners in physics' and format the results as a markdown list"

plan_text: Step 0: Use DuckDuckGo search to find Nobel Prize winners in physics.
Step 1: Convert the search results into a markdown list.
Step 2: Present the markdown list to the user.

steps.description: Search DuckDuckGo for Nobel Prize winners in physics.

tool_arguments.code:
result = duckduckgo_search_results("Nobel Prize winners in physics", 5)
return result

execution_result.result:
Found 5 search results:

1. List of Nobel laureates in Physics - Wikipedia
   URL: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_Nobel_laureates_in_Physics
   Summary: TheNobelPrizeinPhysicshas been awarded to 226 individuals as of 2024. [5] The firstprizeinphysicswas awarded in 1901 to Wilhelm Conrad Röntgen, of Germany, who received 150,782 SEK. John Bardeen is the only laureate to win theprizetwice—in 1956 and 1972.. William Lawrence Bragg was the youngestNobellaureate inphysics; he won theprizein1915 at the age of 25.

2. All Nobel Prizes in Physics - NobelPrize.org
   URL: https://www.nobelprize.org/prizes/lists/all-nobel-prizes-in-physics/
   Summary: TheNobelPrizeinPhysicshas been awarded 118 times to 227NobelPrizelaureates between 1901 and 2024. John Bardeen is the only laureate who has been awarded theNobelPrizeinPhysicstwice, in 1956 and 1972. This means that a total of 226 individuals have received theNobelPrizeinPhysics. Click on the links to get more information.

3. List of Nobel Prize winners in Physics
   URL: https://simple.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_Nobel_Prize_winners_in_Physics
   Summary: TheNobelPrizeinPhysicsis aNobelPrizeinthe science ofphysics. Some famouswinnersare: Albert Einstein; Werner Heisenberg; Marie Curie; Guglielmo Marconi; Peter Higgs; Enrico Fermi; Ernest Lawrence; Paul Dirac; Roger Penrose; Geoffrey Hinton

4. Winners of the Nobel Prize for Physics - Encyclopedia Britannica
   URL: https://www.britannica.com/science/Winners-of-the-Nobel-Prize-for-Physics-1856942
   Summary: TheNobelPrizeforPhysicsis awarded, according to the will of Swedish inventor and industrialist Alfred BernhardNobel, "to those who, during the preceding year, shall have conferred the greatest benefit on mankind" in the field ofphysics. It is conferred by the Royal Swedish Academy of ...NobelPrizewinnersby category (physics) year ...

5. Nobel Prize in Physics: 1901-Present - Live Science
   URL: https://www.livescience.com/16362-nobel-prize-physics-list.html
   Summary: The history of thewinnersof theNobelPrizeinphysics, including Steven Chu, Aage Niels Bohr and Enrico Fermi. ... This was the first time in 55 years that a woman was part of theNobelPrize...
